verbose_text: Yang et al suggested that TNF-alpha promotes the adhesion of monocyte THP-1 to human umbilical vein endothelial cells via the regulation of adhesion molecules by the NF-kappaB signaling pathway, including the expression of chemokine CX3CL1 / monocyte chemotactic protein-1 of ICAM / vascular cell adhesion molecule / S-select in.
evidence: promotes the adhesion of monocyte THP-1 to human umbilical vein endothelial cells via the regulation of adhesion molecules by the NF-kappaB
